sample.util

Class ImageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.util.ImageUtil

  • public class ImageUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    ImageUtil class. Here contains some functions which can help another classes and packages to do image processing.
    Since:
    2017-11-14
    Author:
    Daniel, Pertence
